title: Qamra Personalized Graphic Photo Quartz Watch Leather Band Custom Any Picture Engrave Tex
features: Replace our example photo with your own photo and engrave simple text on the back to create a personalized gift for yourself or everyone you loved. Cherish your memories and create a treasured keepsake gift with our custom watch template.
At around 1.6 inch (Mens size) or 1.3 inch (Womens size) in diameter, this watch works with almost any attire, male or female.
Featuring a dual-hand quartz movement and your choice of an interchangeable genuine leather strap, this watch’s classic look is great for both formal and fun occasions. Bands include black and brown.
The watch is just a life waterproof. Try not to get wet or soak in the water in daily life . It is made of Stainless Steel.
Never hesitate to ask any questions. If you have an idea for something that I do not have listed feel free to talk to me about it
description: Wear Your Favorite Person Or Pet Close To Your Heart With This Lovely Photo Watches. Personalized Photo Watches And Charm With Matching Gift Tin Personalized Watches For Mothers Best Friends Couples.
This is a personalized watch,you can upload your pictures,and we can make it into the watches,This is a very meaningful gift, given to yourself or someone else.
1、Choose the watch size for men or for women
3、Upload your photo and enter the text you want to engrave on the back
Once I receive your photos I will edit them to fit the item ordered.
business days after confirmation for production.
In most cases your photo will be reduced in size so the resolution may change. Photos do not have to be professional...even photos taken with your phone can work out well,we'll make it work.
If you only have an old photo,Just send it to us,we'll make it work;
